name: 室內設計（一）
description: 本課程主要培養空間設計的基礎學習，教學過程以專業講授、創意思考學習、跨域創意激發、空間設計史學與原理、空間案例分析、美學生活體驗等內容，目標在學習空間設計的基本設計原理與實作。
goals: 商業空間類型（餐飲與3C旗艦店商業空間）品牌意象分析與呈現
syllabus:
課程簡紹

Learn the basic concept of interior design process, and obtain professional knowledge for designing a space focusing on human figure and residential space.  

  
課程目標

1.  Acknowledge the fundamental knowledge in interior design
2.  Establish the skill of developing design concept 
3.  Apply the basic knowledge to design based oh human figure
4.  Develop the skill of designing residential interior space  
     

教學進度與主題

This class is to lean the fundamental design process for designing interior space. There are a few criteria knowledge for students to obtain during the semester, which are human figures, proportion, function, developing floor plan, and designing three dimensional interior space. There are several lectures to teach the basic knowledge of interior design, while there are two design projects for students to develop: one is furniture design based on human figure, and the other is residential interior space.  
 

教學進度與主題       P1: Personal Space

                                P2: Green Learning Space

  
毎週進度

Week 1: Introduction and lecture

Week 2: First Assignment given and individual critic

 Week 3: Individual critic

 Week 4: First assignment presentation

 Week 5: VR implementation

 Week 6: Guest Lecture (WELL AP)

Week 7: Case Study of WELL and presentation

Week 8: Field Trip (WELL Certified project in Taipei)

Week 9: Second assignment given and group critic

Week 10: Lecture

Week 11: Group discussion 1

Week 12: Group discussion 2

Week 13: Real-time visualization training and 3D model development

Week 14: Group discussion 3

Week 15: Finalize the design and VR implementation

Week 16: Second assignment final presentation
